did.abstract: Facsimile of title page, leaves 27-40, and two illustrations from part II of Joannis Poleni "Miscellenea." Also includes typewritten English translation of "Miscellanea" by J. Lestrohan, as "Miscellaneous Scientific Works of John Poleni."

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Poleni, Giovanni, Specifications and Drawings of the Poleni Calculating Machine by Joannis Poleni, Crerar Ms 162, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Facsimile of title page, leaves 27-40, and two illustrations from part II of Joannis Poleni "Miscellenea." Also includes typewritten English translation of "Miscellanea" by J. Lestrohan, as "Miscellaneous Scientific Works of John Poleni." Gift of Felt & Tarrant Mfg. Co. Bound in olive buckram.
